messages.title: The most important election of our lifetime?
messages.content: This year's General Election will define the future of Great Britain for generations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support local businesses to create more jobs.
Protect the NHS, increase spending on flood defences, and care for the elderly.
Work on provider performance for trains and broadband delivery.
Help victims of rural crime, support a visible local policing presence.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Education the Priority It Deserves
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure high educational standards and proper funding for schools.

mentions.candidate: Oliver Letwin has a plan for West Dorset.

issues.economy: Support local businesses to create more jobs
issues.education: Ensure high educational standards and proper funding for schools

leaflet.personalStatement: From my West Dorset casework and my surgeries, I know what needs to be done.

politicalExperience.achievements: Bringing superfast broadband to thousands, cut crime by a fifth, improved flood defences, and brought millions into local schools.

images.caption: Examples with Oliver Letwin engaging with the local community and interacting with various demographics.
